fr.sorbonne_u.components.pre.dcc.connectors

Class DynamicComponentCreationConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.pre.dcc.connectors.DynamicComponentCreationConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectorI, ComponentServiceI, OfferedI, RequiredI, DynamicComponentCreationI, java.rmi.Remote

    public class DynamicComponentCreationConnector
extends AbstractConnector
implements DynamicComponentCreationI
    The class DynamicComponentCreationConnector implements a connector between components requiring DynamicComponentCreationI and a component DynamicComponentCreator.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2014-03-14

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String createComponent(java.lang.String classname, java.lang.Object[] constructorParams)
      create a component from the class of the given class name, invoking its constructor matching the given parameters ; beware not to have parameters of base types (int, boolean, etc.) but rather reified versions (Integer, Boolean, etc.) in order for the reflection-based instantiation to work smoothly.
      void executeComponent(java.lang.String componentURI)
      make the execute method of the component run as a task.
      void finaliseComponent(java.lang.String componentURI)
      finalise the component.
      boolean isDeployedComponent(java.lang.String reflectionInboundPortURI)
      return true if the component having the given reflection inbound port URI is deployed on the CVM executing this method.
      boolean isFinalisedComponent(java.lang.String componentURI)
      return true if the CVM has been finalised (i.e. all of the locally deployed components in the CVM).
      boolean isShutdownComponent(java.lang.String componentURI)
      return true if the component has been shut down.
      boolean isStartedComponent(java.lang.String componentURI)
      return true if the component has been started.
      boolean isTerminatedComponent(java.lang.String componentURI)
      return true if the component has terminated.
      void shutdownComponent(java.lang.String componentURI)
      shutdown the component.
      void shutdownNowComponent(java.lang.String componentURI)
      shutdown the component immediately.
      void startComponent(java.lang.String reflectionInboundPortURI)
      start a previously created component on the CVM executing this method.

      • createComponent

        public java.lang.String createComponent(java.lang.String classname,
                                        java.lang.Object[] constructorParams)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: DynamicComponentCreationI
        create a component from the class of the given class name, invoking its constructor matching the given parameters ; beware not to have parameters of base types (int, boolean, etc.) but rather reified versions (Integer, Boolean, etc.) in order for the reflection-based instantiation to work smoothly.

        Contract

         pre    classname != null and constructorParams != null
 post   return != null
 post   isDeployedComponent(return)
        Specified by:
        createComponent in interface DynamicComponentCreationI
        Parameters:
        classname - name of the class from which to instantiate the component.
        constructorParams - parameters to be passed to the constructor of the component instantiation class.
        Returns:
        URI of the reflection inbound port of the created component.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - todo.
        See Also:
        DynamicComponentCreationI.createComponent(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object[])
